##Loading Libraries

```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```


##Create a copy of gapminder

``` {r copyGap}
library(gapminder)
my_gap <-gapminder
my_gap %>% filter(country == "Canada")  

```



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
